taskDescription: Treatment of p-bromotoluene with NaOH at 300 °C yields a mixture of two products, but treatment of m-bromotoluene with NaOH yields a mixture of three products. Explain.
detailedSolution: Only one benzyne intermediate can form from p-bromotoluene; two different benzyne intermediates can form from m-bromotoluene.
